name: ChargeNational
tag_list: merchant-accounts, payment-processing, credit-card-processing, debit-card-processing, ecommerce, virtual-terminals, payment-gateway, canada
overview:
ChargeNational.com (Charge National), a division of Pivotal Payments Direct, is a Canadian owned and operated merchant services provider, offering debit, credit and gift card processing, POS terminals, ecommerce solutions, virtual terminals and payment gateways.

Charge National provides credit card processing solutions and merchant accounts to restaurants, hotels, retail outlets, e-commerce websites, transportation and delivery companies as well as healthcare, legal and travel businesses.

ChargeNational is an independently owned company with no bank affiliation.
